text: Dysgonomonas gadei is a Gram-negative and facultatively anaerobic bacterium from the genus of Dysgonomonas which has been isolated from a gall bladder from a patient in Bergen in Norway. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== * Type strain of Dysgonomonas gadei at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2000
title: Dysgonomonas gadei
